aboutpara: Hello, my name is Enoch and In my life I have worked as a translator at Affinity Radiology, I honed my communication and interpretation skills while providing exceptional customer service to patients and medical staff. In my role as a manager at Vienna Gas and Auto Care, I gained experience in leadership, organization, and problem-solving by recruiting, training, and managing employees, as well as ensuring customer satisfaction. As a server and host at Sakura Japanese Steak & Seafood house, I demonstrated my attention to detail and strong customer service skills by greeting customers, answering their questions, and making recommendations. My diverse background and strong communication, leadership, and customer service skills make me a valuable asset in any industry or role.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a Full stack software engineer
resume.description: I'm a Passionate and diligent worker who excels in adapting to new situations. I have served as missions in Greece Athens providing hospitality and giving English lessons to the refugees. Also lead praise band in church every Sunday for worship
